65a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon pos bskor/ 'og tu pad+ma dmar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje dmar po la a las bskyed pa'i klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ro// mgron spyan drang ba'i phyir rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM oM a ra li hoHhri hriM hri dzaHhUM 
65a8(rgyud 'grel): na y-i// pa rjems/ 'angams // rnam sas / pagasapa pa da mas pa so// se pa sa ga ma la / a e / seM papa dngams pa dang / thags 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): dang klu chen brgyad// bka' bzhin 'khor du gtogs pa rnams// dam tshig dgongs te gnas 'dir gshegs// gzhan yang gru gsum khongs gtogs pa'i// zhing skyong tshogs la 'di lta ste// oM shing gcig dang ni dur 
65b2(rgyud 'grel): khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par drin khang stong dang // gdol pa'i snod dang zang dang ni// khyad par du ni mtshol gnas// ma mo yini gnas rnams nas// nag po drag po drag chen po// 
65b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga byin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs dang me sdug dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byad mo dang drag mo dang // brjed byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang // mi thub gzhan 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang monag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me mo// sum nu ma dang dbang mo dang // 'jigs byed grong gnas 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma// zod phreng phreng chen ba T+wAMm// sbrul chen ral gri dgras can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu chen me// de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga// de bzhin 
65b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te// rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di 
65b7(rgyud 'grel): yis// thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig/ oM kak+ka D+ha na/ ba b+hAn+d+han/ khak+Sha d+hA na sarba duSh+TA naM han ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ he badz+ra maN+Da la sa pa ri lA ro b+h+yo A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHzhes pas bkug la pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par 
65b8(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de nas mchod pas mchod de/ oM ku ru ku ru a d+hi pa ti tiSh+Tha sa ma ya hU~M dzaHgnyis med par bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi lha la thim pa'i rjes su/ lce pad+ma'i steng du bruM las rdo rjer byin gyi brlab po// de nas pad+ma'i 
66a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pa kha phye ste/ gtor ma la gtad nas gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags brjod do// oM AHhUMHhoHbadz+ra b+hai ra bA ya/ badz+ra b+ha bi ya/ dze ga dzo gi ni/ sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra/ sarba DA ka DA ki nISh+Ta b+h+yo/ badz+ra gau r-I/ 
66a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra tsau rI/ badz+ra bet+tA lI/ badz+ra g+hasma rI/ badz+ra puk+ka sAM/ badz+ra sa ba rI/ badz+rA tsaN+Da lI/ badz+ra Da ba nAM/ a ti kaM/ saM pa rI wA re b+ho/ i daM ba liM/ gan+d+ha/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ dI pa/ ak+Sha taM/ da da ma hi te dza/ a kaste/ saM pa ri wA re b+h+yo/ 
66a3(rgyud 'grel): i de ba laM/ gr-ih+Na na tu dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa trap+ta/ sarba sa tra ni shin+taM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ rak+Sha taM ku ru/ a ban ku ru/ gub+hI ka ra duM/ kuR+Yan+na hUM hUM phaT sIhA/ ai daM ba li kha kha khA hi ShA hi/ b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dza dza dzadza/ badz+ra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa yaMta 
66a4(rgyud 'grel): s+yAH/ oM AHhU~M \u0f7fsarba daM ba nA ga yak+ShadrAk+Sha sa/ ma nu a mar+tha'/ a sur/ gar+b+han+da/ k+Sh+mAM b+hi ra b+hId+ha ri/ gAd+haT d+h+wa ta/ prata bi shA tsa/ a basma ra/ u man+ta/ sarba lo ki ka lo ki d+hi ra~M/ badz+ra DAka DA ki nes pa ri wA rits+tsha 
66a5(rgyud 'grel): i ma sarba pU dza gad+d+ha/ puSh+pad+hA pa dI pe/ na bat+yaM/ ak+Sha te da ma hi te tsa/ a gad+d+ha sa pa dI p+na raM b+d+ha/ i daM ba laM gr-id+haR+YA/ kha dan+ta/ pi bar+d+ha n+ya d+hU baM hoHsa ma ya rak+Shir+d+ha/ ma ma sid+d+hi b+he pra yan+nan+ta/ ya thai be/ ya teSh+Tha b+hAny+dza ho/ ma tau kram 
66a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ mam sa rbaM kaR+sha yaM sar+b+ba Ni/ bi shrad+d+ha ye sa ha ka ye kaM/ b+ha ban+d+ha d+h+yaM hUM phaT/ badz+ra d+hA ro A dz+nyA pa ya ta~M/ oM ir+d+ha dza ma dza la dzak+Sha g+h+nAM ta ba dz+rI baM u daMk+Sha/ tsar+tha sAdz+nyA ma ta la bai p+pa ta la b+hU t+tA la/ aT+TA sap+pa sAd+ha/ i daM ba liM b+hid+d+ha dzi g+ne/ baH 
66a7(rgyud 'grel): dA pa/ tI paMmAM sa a m+baka s+t+rai sAh+la r+sar+thA bra~MN beT b+hU da/ oM a s+t+rai ra~M pr-i kha~M sar+b+ba d+haprAr+b+hu sA d+ya rad+baR+Shad+hAHoM AHtrA~M baT saH// de nas tshigs su bcad po 'dis yang bsngo ba na e lA chen brgyad po'i khor bcas dang // 'jig rten 
66a8(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba 'khor bcas dang // klu chan brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // gnod sbyir tshogs rnams ma lus dang // srin po'i chags rnams ma lus dang // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // yi dgas tshogs rnams ma lus dang // 
66b1(rgyud 'grel): sha za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang // smyo byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang // brjed byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshegs rnams ma lus dang // de la sogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs// ma lus tshogs 
66b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas ji snyed rnams// 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol// mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di snoms la// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la// nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // 
66b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing // zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi// las kyi dngos grub pa dag la stsol// dam tshig can gyis bdag la bsrung // dngos grub kun gyi gtong grags mdzod// dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang // 
66b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzad// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// byad byed ngan pazhi bar mdzod// 'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang // 'bru rnams rgyas shing 'phel bar mdzod// bde legs thams cad grub pa dang / 
66b5(rgyud 'grel): yid la 'dod pa 'grub par shog/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// de la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs// drag cing gtum pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs// ma rung sems can ming 'di long // dag cing snying rje med 
66b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi// rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo dang // mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sha za dang // lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang // gzhan yang sha za khrag 'thung ba'i// khyi dang khra dang kaM ka dang // 'ol ba bya rgod la sogs pa'i// gzugs can thams 
66b7(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dir gshegs shig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la// gnod par byed pa 'di zhes pa// chung ma nor dang srog dang ni// 'dod pa rnams ni 'phrog par mdzod// dang gi yul nas 'byung ba dang // dgang ba dang ni bskrad
66b8(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// bdag gi dpung ni stobs med la// dgra ni stobs ldan kho na ste// 'di nyid khyod kyis bza' ba'i phyir// sha dang khrag dang zhag dang rkang // bza' ba skom dang bcas pa mdzod// dgra lus gsol ba dgra 
67a1(rgyud 'grel): mdangs phrogs// rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par// long la za ba nyid du gyis// thams cad tshim par bzhes su gsol// gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing // dgra 'di thams cad choms par mdzod// 
67a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni// rgya chen yongs su skul nas kyang // nyid kyi gnas dang yul du gshegs// ci nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// pus mo// 
67a3(rgyud 'grel): lha nga sa la btsugs nas ni// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba ni// btsun mo dang ni sras dang g.yog tu bcas// gsan cing 'dir gshegs bdag la bka' drin skyabs// bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang
67a4(rgyud 'grel): ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang // gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyi mthus// sems can rnams la phan ga dgos pas// don rnams yang dag bsam pa
67a5(rgyud 'grel): kun// sems can khams ni ma lus par// de dag thams cad ci rigs par// thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig/ sngags pa gang zhig dgra bgegs char bcad par 'dod pa des/ gzugs gtor ma'i steng du bzhag 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa mi gdug pa'i gzugs can/ pho nya grangs med pas zos 'thungs par bsam zhing / gtor ma bstab cing 'di skad las bcol lo// oM ma lus zhing na bzhug pa'i rgyal ba dang // dpal 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): chen khrag 'thung khro rgyal 'jigs byed tshogs// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma yi tshegs// dam can rgya mtsho ma lus dgongs su gsol// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // gdul dka' drag po'i 
67a8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sgyu ma lta bur cir yang ston mdzad pa// gdum chen rab rngam tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// snyigs ma lnga ldan bstan pa 'jig dus 'dis// bdud dang mu stegs log par lta ba rnams// 
67b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i las kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// tshe rje drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// 
67b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i// tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po dang // lha yi dbang po 'dod pa'i lha// khyab 'jug tshogs kyi bdag po dang // b+h+r-i gi ri ti'i gzhon nu dang // dga' byed dbang phyug 'dod lha dang // nyi ma 
67b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gza' chen dang // smin drug la sogs khrung gi mgo/ mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas// rdo rje sku yid mchog can// dkar po rtag pa'i dbu rgyun can// zhal cig pa la phyag gnyis te// 'khor lo 
67b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rdul bu 'bral// rig mdang na maHma du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas// phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// dus mtha' mechen klong dkyil na// hU~M phaT tho ba 'jigs par sgrogs/ 
67b5(rgyud 'grel): stang ga tshogs bcas pa yi// namakha' zhin khyod kyis na// dam tshig rkyen las dus labab// drug mi bka' bzhin du// in dra ti pak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di lang 
67b6(rgyud 'grel): la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdorje slob dpon slob ma dang // rdo rje sman dang meng sring la// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgags ni// sngags chud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon spyod cing spun la 'khra// byung 
67b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems srang dam chog thams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// gdug cing sngangasams ldan pa rnams// rab tu drongs shig 'dir khrag la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin las dus la bag/ 
67b8(rgyud 'grel): sha dang khrag dang rus pa gsol// sku mgo steng nang grol drongs// sngon gyi dmalas ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes 
68a1(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i// brgya byin gshin rje chu bdag dang // gnod sbyin dbang dag ma yi lha// srin po rlung lha la sogs pa// srin po'i mgo can 
68a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mgyogs pa ba gshog pas gdengs ka byas// rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig can// nag po mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// rdo rje dang ni dril bus brel// rig ma dang ni 
68a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas// phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan// dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na// hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs// bar gyi mi tshogs bcas pa yi// bar snang ro zhon
68a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi // dam tshig phrin las dus la bab// hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du// in+ta du ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byer sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon
68a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dang // rdo rje spun dang ming srid la// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing sman la 'khu// byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 
68a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul bas// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// sngon spyod phrin las dus la ba ba// sha dang khrag dang rul pa rol// rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs// 
68a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar// bcol ba de las rnams grub par mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal ba zhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 
68a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad pa// stobs rgyu dung skyong mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas bu dang 'dzeg po dang // rigs ldan pad+ma chen po dang // pad+ma la sogs chu srin mgo/ mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas// rdo rje gsung gi dam 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs can// dmar po gar dbang dbu rgyan ldan// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// pad+ma dang ni dril bus brel// rig pa dang ni mnyam du sbyor// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas// phyag rgya drug gis lus
68b2(rgyud 'grel): la brgyan// dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na// hUM phaT pho pheM 'jigs par sgrogs// 'og gi klu tshegs bcas pa yi// sa 'og ro zhon khyod kyis ni// dam tshig thugs dam dus la bab// hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): in+ta ru ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di leng la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas// rdo rje spun dang ming sring la// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs 
68b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// sngags rgud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon snod cing spun la 'khu// byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rab tu drongs shig/ 
68b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab// sha dang khrag dang rus pha rol// rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs// sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub 
68b6(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing // bstan pa bsrung bar zhal ba zhes pa// 'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du// shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad ma// phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pa na// dpa'/ 
68b7(rgyud 'grel): bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor tshogs// zhing skyong drag po ro langs dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs tshogs// sha za brjed byed srul po dang // nam gru log 'dren la sogs pa// gnod sbyin sa bdag gdug pa'i 'dre// 
68b8(rgyud 'grel): la la srin po'i zhal can la// mi yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// la la stag gi mgo can la// mi yaM lus can rngam pa'i gzugs// la la seng+ge'i mgo can la// srin bu'i gzugs can shin tu khro// la la mkha' 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): lding mgo can la// klu yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de bzhin bya yi mgo can dang // gcan zan lus can sna tshogs rnams// la la khro zhing la la rngam// la la zhi zhing la la gtum// la la 'gying zhing
69a2(rgyud 'grel): la la lding // la la sha za khrag 'thung brtson// la la khro gtum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// la la rab brtson khro gnyer can// la la bzhad gad ha ha sgrogs// la la 'brug skad bzhin du ldir// la la rngam skad phe pheM sgrogs// la la 
69a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' stong gar gyis 'gengs// la la rtsub cing la la gnag/ la la dkar zhing rnam par gsal// la la dmar zhing chags pa'i mdog/ la la sngo zhing sdang ba'i tshul// la la ser po dbyibs mdog rgyas// lal khro gnyer smin 
69a4(rgyud 'grel): burngub// la la sprin bu gyen du 'khyil// sgra 'khyil na mkha'i dbyings su khyab// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag 'thung ba'i// ljags 'dril mche ba dmar po gtsigs// spyan gsum sdung mig khro gnyer can// rus pa'i gaNar 
69a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng sbrul gyis brgyan// khrag zhag tshil gyis tshom bus brgyan// glang chen ko rlon rnam par bshal// stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas// na bza' me yi pags blag gsol// la la rdo rje gtum shing dang // ral gri chu gril 
69a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// la la gar gyis phyag rgyas sbyor// phyi yi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dir// phyi rol 'byung po'i tshogs bcas rnams// sa stengs ro zhon thams cad kyi// dam tshig phrin las 
69a7(rgyud 'grel): dus la bab// hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du// in+d+ra ru ti rak+ta dang // ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang // sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la// bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang // rdo rje spun dang ming 
69a8(rgyud 'grel): sring la// gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni// sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing // slob dpon smod cing spun la 'bu// byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams// zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas// gdug po'i sdang sems 
69b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa rnams// rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la// rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs// mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab// sha dang khrag dang rus la rol// rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs// sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' 
69b2(rgyud 'grel): bar// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// de nas gsang ba'i las bzhi bya// de nas rdo rje'i glu brjod/ de nas chos bshad de/ oM chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// rgyu dang 
69b3(rgyud 'grel): las la kun tu 'byung // de bzhin nyid la nges par skyes// bden pa 'dis ni dkyil 'khor du// kun gyi dri ma med mthong shog/ sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba der// sangs rgyas nyid dang 
69b4(rgyud 'grel): prad par shog/ de nas smon lam gdab pa ni// oM shI la tsaN+Dan le pe ta a gad+hA nAM pra b+ha ra Na/ po te ka ku su mi kI ra NaM bi ha ra taM/ bud+d+ha bi sha ya/ pun rA ga ma na ya muHoM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa 
69b5(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho be b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to mi b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba rkarma suts+tsha me/ tsistaM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga ban/ sarba ta tha ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHde nas bkra/ 
69b6(rgyud 'grel): shes brjod/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// ces pas rang bzhin gyi mgron 
69b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ dam tshig gi mgron yi ge gsum du byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bsdu'o// rnal 'byor pa yi ser sna dang // dbul ba'i dri ma sbyang ba dang // dngos grub myur du thob pa dang // 'gro rnams
69b8(rgyud 'grel): bkod par 'brel phyir byas// dge bas 'gro kun byang chub mchog/ rin chen glang du myur 'gro shog/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po a la la badz+ra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta 
70a1(rgyud 'grel): ka s+tha pa ga tha ga thA ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// 6/ gtong ma'i las kyi rim pa bzhugs/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ ba li karma kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i las kyi 
70a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang / de yi chos skyong srungs ma la// bzod gsol don du 'dud pa dang // rgyu yi phyir kyang phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs gnyis 
70a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya ba dang // snga ma'i lan chags bral ba dang // 'phral gyis bar chad nyer bzhi'i phyir// gtor ma rgyun du btang bar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang // phrin las rnam bzhi rtsom pa dang // dbang bskur chen po byed pa'i 
70a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe// gtor ma'i rim pa 'di ltar bya// yo byad dang ni bca' thabs dang // dgod rim dang yang byin rlabs dang // dbul dang dbang bskur dbye ba bdun// las kyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa'o// sha dang bdud rtsi zas lnga dang // gzhan 
70a5(rgyud 'grel): yang bza' btung sna tshogs te// gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la// mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bya// mdor na sna tshogs pa yi rdzas// sdig pa med cing gnod pa med// yo byad dam par 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtor ma 
70a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni// shin tu che ba'i snod dag tu// mchod pa'i bye brag kha zas kyis// khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu// a shwad+tha yi shing dag la// gru gsum phyag rgya byas te bzhag/ gru gsum rtsel mar me gsum// nyin mtshan rtag tu 
70a7(rgyud 'grel): btang bar bya// de ru 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang // gdugs dang phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag/ de'i dbus su zan kham gsum// steng du ban+d+ha mtshan bzangs dag/ khrag chen dag gis gang ba bzhag/ gzhan yang mdzes pa'i snod dag/ 
70a8(rgyud 'grel): tu// khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu// 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gdugs rnams gzugs// mar me gcig kyang rtag tu gtang // mkha' 'gro ma dang phyogs skyong ni// mdzes pa'i snod du rdzas rnams kyis// legs pa bkang 
70b1(rgyud 'grel): ste bzhag par bya// tshogs dang tshogs kyi rol pa yin// lhag pa dag la lhag ma bya// kun kyang gcan zan rjes bzhin nam// las kyi dbyibs dang sbyar bar bya// chang dang khrag dang chu yis spang // gtor chen rtsa ba'i dbus

70b3(rgyud 'grel): las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi dbus dang phyogs mtshams su// hU~M gr-i a dr-i khi/ nA go kud ta/ dri ku chen khrag dang ga bur shel// mi dang b.lang khyi glang te// de yi steng du yig 'brubasam// de nas rigs lnga 
70b4(rgyud 'grel): yab yu pa bsam// de sted oM las zla ba ste// de snyed hUM las rdo rje bsam// bai TaM kye 'bud cing 'bar ba dang // bsros te dros pas ya ba yum rol// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu dgan gnas 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): pU yaM// bde gshegs ye shes byang chub sems// sems can rnapas kyi babreg ga zi mdangs// ci shing nags tshal bcud bsdus te// skar yang je bzhin dgug par bya// thim nas thams cad 'ad dun//

70b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la ni phyogs skyong dang // de bzhin gsum par glu chen brgyad// 'khor ding bcas pa mo se pas so// tshogs kyi rdzas rnams drangs pa la// bsang gtor byas te byin gyis brlab// phud bgros pad+ma'i phyag rgyas 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): blang // sngags 'di brjod cing dbul bar bya// oM e h+ye badz+ra i daM ba liM khA hi/ lha rnams kun la de bzhin dbul// bsrung ba'i dbang sngags brjod cing dbul// bstod cing rdo rje glu yang blang // de nas lhag ma'i phud bkros te/ 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum zla ba'i steng dag tu// bdag nyid kye yi rdo rjer bsgom// de yi khyams la mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor dang bcas pa mos pas bsam// gnyis pa la ni dbang phyug ma// gzhan yang 'gro ba ris drug dang / 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs kyis yul gyi lha 'dre rnams// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas na sa su// oM e h+ye hi/ sarba yo gi ni/ sarba DA kli ni/ brah+ma Ni ru tra ni/ ma he shra ri/ beSh+Ta be/ bA rA hi/ na ya sing+ga/ a ya te/ ag+na ye/ ba ru Na ye ba ya be ku ma ri 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): ko be ra/ ga ru Ni/ pa sA ki/ b+hi na ya ki/ b+he pa sa tri b+hai pra ma ni/ b+heska ri tsa muN+Da/ sarba de ba/ sarba a su ra/ sarba ma nu Sha/ sarba tir ya ga/ sarba pre ta ga/ sarba nA ra ga/ sarba b+hU ta/ bI shA tsa/ uSh+man+da a pa sma ra ta ya/ mos pa'i 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du spyan drang mchod// pad+ma'i phyag rgya sa blangs la dpral// pur+thad+hu pa dI pa gan+d+ha/ ni bi t+ye/ pany+tsa a mr-i te/ mtha/ drar+Na/ ba tag te/ tsa tra mar/ sa yo tha ma tsam sa/ maN+Da ra kata/ nan ShA hi/ saM pu ra naM/ i da ba li b+h+ra tshaH/ gr-iH

71b8(rgyud 'grel): nAM/ ma hA ka bi de/ bi bi tan+ta ka rA ya/ sarba ge ri u pa thaM ba sa maM na/ ku ru ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA// de ltar bdud rtsis mtshams bcad nas// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma dbul// ba li ga tha/ oM A ra li hoHdzaHhU~M baM haH

74b4(rgyud 'grel): rab bsgoms te// de la A li kA li las// 'byung ba nyem zla ba bsam// de dag rab tu sa bon ni// a dang hUM las gyur pa yi// rdo rje gri gug bsgom par bya// de la rang sems bdag nyid kyi// a \u0f7f yongs su zhugs pa

74b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan// dbu skra lam pa gyen du 'khyil// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo snyan cha phyag gdub dang // mgur chu dang ni ske rags rnams// sangs rgyas lngar ni dag pa yis// 'di rnams byeg rgyar rab tu 
74b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgrags// laM grangs bcu drug lta bu la// rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can// g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang // gnyis pa yum gyi bdag nyid kyi// kha T+wAM ga yang 'khyud pa'o// g.yas na rdo rje nag po ste// hUM gi sgra 'byin bdag nyid 
75a1(rgyud 'grel): can// zhe sdang bdag nyid bsgom par bya// gal te phyag rgya byed 'dod na// g.yon gyi dang po kA pA la// lha dang lha min khrag gi sa bkang // g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// lhag pa'i phyag gnyis ji lta bar// rang 
75a2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba'i phag mo 'khyud// gzhan yang sngon nyid ji lta ba'o// gzhan yang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// g.yas pa'i zhal ni skya reng 'dra// g.yon pa dmar po gcer bu ste// g.yon gyi dang po tre shUl la// g.yas kyi 
75a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po rdo rje'o// g.yon pa gnyis pa dril bu dang // g.yas pa gnyis pa ka ta ri// lhag mas rdo rje lu gu rgud// gri dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud// gzhan ni sngo bzhin yum de bzhin// gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba ni// 
75a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam pa mnan// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan cing // nyi ma la bzhugs 
75a5(rgyud 'grel): gar gyis stabs// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'chang // kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed// rang zhal nas ni hUM 'phro zhing // sku la thal bas rnam par byugs// bdag med ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i// dga' ba'i sbyor 
75a6(rgyud 'grel): ba snyoms par 'jug/ rnam par mi rtog bde ba yi// mi rtog rang bzhin bde bar gnas// dang po'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa me tog kun da 'dra// dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar ba che// steng gi zhal ni rnam par 
75a7(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan dang ldan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba 'dra// g.yas kyi 'bar ba'i phyag brgyad na// pad+ma ban+d+ha brgyad nang du// glang po rta dang bung bu dang // ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang // byil dang ni seng ge 
75a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rim po bzhin du shes par bye// sa dang chu dang rlung dang me// zla ba nyi ma de bzhin yang // gshin rje dang ni gnod sbyin rnams// g.yon gyi bcwa brgyad du'o// skrag dang dpa' dang mi sdug dang // rgod dang khro dang / 
75b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par byed// snying rje ngo mtshar zhi la sogs// 'bar ba'i gar dgu nyams dang ldan// zhabs kyis sa la brdabs mdzad cing // lha min lha la bsdigs mdzad pa'i// rang gi snying gar ra yig las// byung
75b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi// ngo bo nyid kyi hUM yig go/ rdo rje yi ge hUM las byung // kha dog nag po drag po che// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par// de nyid hUM du bsgom par bya// 
75b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang hUM yig yongs gyur pa'i// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom// rdo rje las byung nag po che// 'dim skyes sngon po rab 'dra ba'i// yang na sngo rangs shar ba 'dra// dad pas nges par bsgom par bya// 
75b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhal yas yid 'ong ba'i// ma mo'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// yab yum gnyis su med pa yi// yid 'ong sbyor ba'i dgyes pa las// byung ba'i gau rI dbang po'i phyogs// shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas/ 
75b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las// byung ba'i tsau rI yang spros te// lho phyogs sgo skyong tsau rI ga nas// 'jam po 'jug pa sbyor ba las// bet+tA lI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nas bdud 'joms nub sgor ro// snyoms 'jug 
75b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba chen po las// g+hasma rI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nas byang gi sgo ru ni// khro bo gzugs su rnam par gnas// gnyis sprad pa yi sbyor ba yis// puk+ka sI yang dbyung bar bya// spros nas dbang ldan grwa ru ni/ 
75b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas// gzhan yang gnyis med sbyar ba las// sha ba rI ni me yi gra// tsaN+Da lI ni srin po'i phyogs// Dom+bi rlung gi grwa ru'o// gau ri ga yas na gri gug ste// g.yon pa na ni de bzhin nya// tsau rI 
75b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rje chung ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o// bet+tA lI g.ya sa ru sbal te// g.yon na pad+ma ban d+ha'o// g+hasma rI ni g.yas na sprul// g.yon pa na ni rnal 'byor snod// puk+ka sI g.yas seng+ge ste// g.yon na de bzhin 
76a1(rgyud 'grel): 6// dgra sta'o// sa ba rI g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon na de bzhin bsreg shang // tsaN+Da lI g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon pa na ni de bzhin gshol// Do mrig yas na rdo rje ste// g.yon na de bzhin sdigs 
76a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub bo// gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis gsungs// skye 'brang byed mgar gyi sbubs// spyan ga sum sgrani sbyin du brdzes// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyar// ga sgra mdog nag par 'gyu // tsau nA btsud dang 'dra bste/ 
76a3(rgyud 'grel): be sde nigasar btsam// b+habla ma na ta lta bu ste// brag i ni la 'dra// / 'od sa bus pa // nA smin nam pa'i mdog m+bi sna tshegs dan du bshad// tshangs dang dbang po nyid dbang po// drag pog shen rjegan de sbyin dang // bden bral na ne/ 
76a4(rgyud 'grel): sa thabangs des// gau d+hAl phyogs sngam yi// rim bzhin gdan du shes par bya// de rnams sa thon 'di yin// la b+hA bas/ bdag posas pan 'di dag las// da rnams gdan pa nyid bya// de nas dang /

76a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po dang sbyang ba bdag 'dod stong pa'i rang bzhin pasal te bzhengs su gsol// stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal nas sa yi dngos grub dgos don du// gal te gson par mchis bzhid kyi yi rdo rje bzhengs

76b1(rgyud 'grel): skyengs bon las byung ba'i// 'bar ba nag pa lpags nA yaM// khams gas pa gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// spyan drangs ma mo brgyad rnams kyis// snron bzhin mchod de gsol ba gdapa// bdag nyid chen sa

76b7(rgyud 'grel): spor ba yis// de dag tshim pa nyid du bya// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor ni// blag ma gru gsum kha dog gnyis// yi ge yaM dang raM gyis mtshan// ba dan dang ni rdo rjes mdzes// de steng ban+d+ha aM las blang // der ni ye shes

77a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor rab 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes phung por ni// rdo rje ma dang gau rI dang // chu yi lha mo mkha' 'gro ma// bdag med rnal 'byor mar dag go/ sa chu me rlung 'byung ba ba'i//

77a3(rgyud 'grel): chags phrag dog rdo rje dang // bdag med rnal 'byor mar shes bya// 'khor lo skan cha mgur chu dang // phyag gdub ska rags phyag rgya lnga// mi bskyod mtha' yas rin chen dbang // snang mdzad don grub bdag nyid do//

77b1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu gnyis su shes// sa bon aM dang hUM dang ni// oM dang haM ste rim bzhin no// A li kA li sprul pa la// yongs su bskor bar shes par bya// bde gshegs yab yum sa bon gyis// chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin

78a1(rgyud 'grel): bsregs pa dang // spyan la sogs pa bsregs pa dang // haM bsregs zla ba 'bab pa'o// de ni 'di ltar shes bya ste// rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa yis// bsreg pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// 
78a2(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa me dang rlung yin te// ye shes me yi snang ba gang // las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yin// las kyang bcom ldan shes rab ma'i// rlung gi de nyid 'di yin te// lte ba'i dbus las 'phro zhing phra// chos dang longs spyod// 
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bde chen bzhi// brten dang g.yo ba kun gyi bdag/ yi ge aM ga bdag nyid ni// las kyi rlung gi gzhi yin te// 'di las kun tu 'byung ba yin// 'di dag rgyu ba'i rim pa ni// nyi ma gcig la thun bzhi ste// de bzhin chu tshod

78a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyun 'bab pa dang // nad chen 'byung ba'i snga ltas la// de dag dus gcig 'byung ba ste// 'di ni na mkha'i khams su brjod// rlung dang ye shes rnam shes dang // dug rnams lhan cig rgyu ba ste// nams kyang 'bral

79a7(rgyud 'grel): takru ra tsitwA ya/ ad+hin+nadaSh+TI ts+tshim+bA ra ya m+b+ha ra yaM/ kA ra~M ya k+Sha ra ya/ gadz+ra ya gardza ya/ tardza ya tardza ya~M/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sab+ta sA ga d+han/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ nI bIr+thA tAna~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ shad+d+hA hi hA hi hI pra h+lA ha ha ha~MH ha~M/ 
79a8(rgyud 'grel): phaT swI t+tha/ phyag bcu drug pa'i'o// bzlas pas skyo bar byed pa na// rdo rje dril bu gsil byas te// mchod dang bstod dang smon lam dag/ legs par btab ti phyag tu grol// dbyings su bsu deng gshegs gsas/ 
79b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// je lta ji bzhin bya ba yin// de nas rnal 'byong chen pa yas// spya la mthun tu lta nyid kyi// ting nge 'dzin las thams pa bya// 'di ltar zhal ba'i chen yang // rdo rje 'dzin chen tid 'dzin gyi// chags chen 
79b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su chags b+hAs te// ye shes me yis lus zhunas// chos su sems su gyur par nyal// gang tshe sdang ba'i tshen yang // tshad med bzhi yis bskul ba yis// sngon gyi smon lamarjes dran nas// snum wA ng+gA / 
79b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis// ting 'dzin rim par ltung bar bya// gang zhig zab tshon yang // sdom pa'i dngos po ji lta ba'i// lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor te// zas te bdud rtser byin brlab bya// zos pa dbyer med tshim par gyi// 
79b4(rgyud 'grel): ya~Md na sbyin sreg mchod pa zla// ra sa nAMn me ya~M khams// g.yas su 'brang zhing 'phro ba ste// A la nga bar shes par bya// la lan+d+ra ni rlung gi khams// g.yon du gnubs shing g.yo ba ste// b+hU li'i ngo ba 
79b5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// de dbus lus kyi bdag nyid la// bza' sogs 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya// gal te 'gro 'chag byed pa na// rigs lnga rnams la bslang ba dang // phyag rgyal sogs rgyan rnams dang // rdo rje thod pa'i spyod/ 
79b6(rgyud 'grel): padag/ ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin bya// 'dis ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gal te gtor ma gtong 'dod na// he ru ka yi sbyor ba yis// 'byung po la ni mngon dmigs te// zas rnams bdud rtsir byin brlabs 
79b7(rgyud 'grel): nas// sngags 'di yis ni tshim par bya// oM in+da dzam/ dza la/ dzak+Sha/ b+hU ta/ bar+t+ti/ ba u/ rAk+Sha/ tsan+da/ sudz+dza mA da/ bap+pa/ pa tA le/ aT+TA sap+pa swA hA/ i daM/ ba laM/ b+h+r-i dzaM/ dzi g+ha/ pul+la/ d+hU prA/ mA sa/ baig+ha/ 
79b8(rgyud 'grel): am+baka d+he/ saH/ bArbu \u0f7f/ phaT pAd/ oM e Sh+Ta bums hU~M AHna trA oM A Sh+Ta phaT swAH// ga shig rtag te 'du byed pa// las rnams thams pa de 'grub bapa dang // 'byung po'i tshigs rnams 
80a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' nas ni// de la dngos grub myur bar 'gyur// las rnams dag gi mjug tu yang // mchod dang bstod cing smon lam gdab// de la smon lam 'di yin te// rigs ldan skye zhing blo gros rjes su
80a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan// dam tshig ldan zhing kye yi rdo rje ston// snying rje ldan zhing bla ma rnams la gus// skye ba kun tu 'di ltar ste gyur cig/ rdo rje dril bu lag gis 'khrol byed cing // zab mo'i dam ches rab tu klog pa dang // 
80a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig btsun mo'i khu ba za byed par// skye ba kun tu 'di ltar skye gyur cig/ de nas sprul pa rang la bsdu// ye shes dkyil 'khor slar gshegs gsol// spyod lam la sogs sngon bzhin du// slob dpon chen 
80a4(rgyud 'grel): po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ he badz+ra'i sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shri dz+nyA na dang / rod zo ma d+harmA b+ha dras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la 
80a5(rgyud 'grel): phab pa'o// @6// dpal kye'i rdenga' sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man dag bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he badz+ra nA ma sA d+ha no pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
80a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab thabs dag bdag nyid can// kye rdor bdag med ma la'ang // bla mar bcas la phyag 'tshal nas// rim pa gsum pa'i sgrub thabs brtsam// mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang // bla ma 
80a7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ston rnyed par dka'// bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul// 'gro phan lam la brten par gyis// yon tan ldan zhing brtson par ldan// bla mar gus shing dang ldan pa// rgyal ba'i chos la the tshom med// 
80a8(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang dbye ba nges tshig las// snod yin phyir na drin sbyin bya// chu sogs bum pa'i dbang bskur dang // rim bzhin gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes dbang bskur la// de srid bla ma'i 
80b1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag mtha'// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// ri dang nags tshal dang ni phug/ chu 'gram bzhi mdo mtsho dang ni// shing gcig dben pa dur khrod rnams// bsam gtan khang pa byas nas ni// bdud rtsi sogs/ 
80b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis byug par bya// bris sku sogs mchod dgra ma byas la// nang par sngar langs sems bdag nyid// phyi rol khrus sogs kun byas la// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// sbyong byed dag pa la sogs kyis// 
80b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lha ni bsgrub par byA// thA m+ba rdo rje can bsams nas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba'o// mchod pa'i sprin ni spros byas la// de nas rim bzhin dbul bar bya// de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod/ 
80b4(rgyud 'grel): gau r-I byang chub sems kyi mchod// tsau rI rang byud me tog gis// mi bskyod 'dzin pa bet+tA lI// snang mdzad kyis mchod g+hasma rAM// puk+ka sI yis lcags kyus mchod// swa ba rI ni ro 'dzin to// tsaN+Da lI ni rnga chung 
80b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// Dom+bi sa gnyis med sbyor ba byed// sangs rgyas chos dang tshegs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi// kye rdor shes rab bdag nyid can// slob dpon la ni skyebs su mchi// sdig pa bdag 
80b6(rgyud 'grel): gis gang byas pa// bdag gzhan don du ma lus par// so sor bshags shing slar yang ni// mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa nod// bde gshegs kun gyi bsod nams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 
80b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams la// yang dag nyid du yi rang ngo // phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bdag gis de la bskul ba ni// sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 
80b8(rgyud 'grel): bar bskul// sems can sangs rgyas thob bar du// rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs nas ni// nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar// thal mo sbyar na sa gsol bar 'tshal// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la// byang chub lam 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): ni ston pa po// bsod nams kun gyi 'byung gnas che// byang chub rnams kyang de bzhin bskyed// lus ngag yid kyi bsod nams ni// bgyis sam bgyid du stsal ba dang // rjes su yi rang gang ci 
81a2(rgyud 'grel): yang rung // des na 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog/ snying rje rlan gyi brlan sems kyis// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ni// dang po byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum par
81a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bsgom par bya// kun gyi mtha' nas btang snyoms so// dngos rnams bdag la bsdu bar bya// bdag kyang ye shes sems dpa' 'o// ye shes sems dpa' nA da'i bar// de nyid smig rgyu sbru mar 
81a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// oM shUn+yA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha// ai A ni mi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko hau// oM A pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de nas skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// skye ba nyid 
81a5(rgyud 'grel): du mos par bya'o// raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje sa bon dang ldan pa de la sa 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bdud rnams btul nas// dra ba dang ra ba dang sA gzhir 
81a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur par bsam par bya'o// de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa dkar po bsams la// de'i steng du baM las sna tshogs pad+ma// kha las sna tshogs rdo rje/ de'i steng du laM las sa'i
81a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ljang khu/ der baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po// de las raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po// der yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra
81a8(rgyud 'grel): ba nag po// de la thig le dang ldan par bsams nas/ de rnams gcig tu gyur pas/ gzhal ya khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad dang / dra ba dang dra ba byed pa dang / rin po che dang 'dod 
81b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan la sogs pas smras pa/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der srog song ba dang bcas pas sems las grub par bsam par bya'o// de'i lte bar A li las zla ba'i 
81b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes/ der kA li las mnyam pa nyid ye shes/ de'i dbus su hUM dang aM las rdo rje dang gri gug sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes/ thams cad gcig tu gyur 
81b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes/ sku rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sku mdoge sngon po zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pas shes rab mal 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga ngo 
81b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa spyan gsum pa dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan cing / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod pa rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhis do shal byas pa/ gcer bu g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par
81b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o// bdag med ma ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams shing sku la 'khyud pa skyes pa'i thod pas do shal byas shing g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya ste/ gzhan ni thabs dang 'dra/ nang 
81b6(rgyud 'grel): du yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o// mig la gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje/ snal ser sna rdo rje/ lce la 'dod chags rdo rje/ lus la phrag dog rdo rje/ yid la bdag med ma bsam par bya'o// de nas rang gi 
81b7(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer nag po// lcags kyu'i dbyibs can spros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod yon la sogs pas mchod nas/ dam tshig gi 'khor
81b8(rgyud 'grel): lo la bcug te gnyis su med par bsam par bya'o// yang 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad he ru'i gzugs kyis smon drangs nas/ de la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag la byang chub kyi 
82a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis dbang bskur nas/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam par bya ste/ ji srid du mi skyo'i bar du rnal 'byor du bya'o// skyon bzlas pa bya ste/ rig ma'i snying ga nyi ma'i dkyil

82a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam par bya'o// de bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam par bya'o// oM da ba bi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis gsang ba'i rdo rje dang pad+ma 
82a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o// brtag pa bcu drug pa las/ ma phugs pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur/ phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid ces gsungs so// de nas 
82a5(rgyud 'grel): yang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste/ lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po'i dbus su rang rig pa'i bdag nyid rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gnas par bsam mo// snying ga'i 
82a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa thig le dang ldan pa/ mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po// byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o// mgo bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma
82a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug pa dkar po de'i dbus su lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od dang ldan par bsam par byas nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo las 'od zer 'phros nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang longs spyod kyi 'khor lo nas yang 
82a8(rgyud 'grel): song ste/ bde ba chen po las lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mdzod spu nas byung ste sems can thams cad sbyangs nas bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ 
82b1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs te gzung 'dzin dang bral nas/ za ma tog tu babs mar bsam par bya ste/ de la rtse gcig tu bya'o// mi gsal na yang de bzhin du bya'o// yang na bdag med ma rang gi snying gar bsdu/ 
82b2(rgyud 'grel): rang yang hUMl bsdu/ de yang thig le 'od dang ldan par bsam par bya ste/ gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni/ rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom/ dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems 
82b3(rgyud 'grel): bo// ljang ben yang bdag dang gzhan 'khor lo 'am/ tsaN+Da lI mos par bya ste/ mdzod pa la sogs pa yang mi bya'o// de yang phyag rgyab cing ba rnam par spa / mchod rten las ni maM b+hA zhing // rdo rje gsum mchog phyag 
82b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'tshal// dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las// rmi lam du yang mi bya'o// zhes gur las gsungs so// mchod rten brtsig par mi bya ste// de bzhin mchod sogs mi bya'o// gtsug lag dag ni rnyed sla ste// 
82b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi dgos pa rnyed par dka' zhes gdan bzhi pa las gsungs so// de nas yang lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya'o// gang tshe ye shes rlung gis ni// rang rig dag ni bskyod nas su// sangs 
82b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams ni bsrogs pa yis// dga' ba la sogs rim bzhin skye// ci 'dra ba ni skye zhe na// gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba// lkugs pa'i dga' ba ji lta ba'o// gnyis med ye shes skye bor 'gyur// thog ma
82b7(rgyud 'grel): tha ma dbus med cing // 'khor min mya ngan 'das ma yin// bdag nyid gzhan nyid yod ma yin// 'di ni mchog tu bde ba yin// bdag med ye shes nyid du 'gyur// bdag gzhan nges par rig pa spangs// 
82b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mnyam skyon bral lhan cig skyes// thams cad lus la rang bzhin gnas// dga' ba dang po 'khor ba'i gzugs// de bzhin mchog dga' 'khor ba nyid// dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'khor bdag nyid// 
83a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid// dga' bral dga' ba la sogs pa// gsum pa spangs par gyur na ni// bzhi pa gang las skye bar 'gyur// de bas gsum po
83a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs byas te// bzhi pa bsgom por bya ba yin// rtsa ba'i rgyu ni gsum du gyes// de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa yin// yang na 'bras bu gsum gyis spangs// yang na rang gis gsum pa yin// dga' ba'i bye brag tu 
83a3(rgyud 'grel): shes bya// 'khor lo rnams kyi rim pa'o// zhes rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so// dang po bum pa'i dbang yin// mchog gi dga' ba gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang // bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po 
83a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// mnyam par ma bzhag dus su yang // bya ba gang la 'jug pa na// lhan cig skyes las ma gtogs par// gzhan gyi sems kyis mi gnas so// de yang brtag pa bcu drug pa las// bde ba gnag cing bde 
83a5(rgyud 'grel): bser// bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar// bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo// bde brgya dang mir+g+ho kun// bde ba thabs dang shes rab ste// de bzhin mnyam par bzhag pa ste// bde ba dngos po dngos med bde// rdo rje sems/ 
83a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bde bar brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas brjod pa'i rim pa la gnas pas/ bar chad thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma ni/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs
83a7(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas/ de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung nas bsams la de'i steng du paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la/ de'i steng du oM las 'khor lo sa bon dang ldan pa 
83a8(rgyud 'grel): la 'od zer 'phros pas/ gzugs med pa dang gzugs can dang / 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad 'od zer des sku rdo rjer byas nas/ der bsdus te gcig tu gyur pa las/ sku rdo rje zhal cig pa phyag gnyis 
83b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bus shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o// shes rab ma yang thabs dang 'dra/ bar du hUM las rdo rje/ de las phyogs

83b3(rgyud 'grel): sku rdo rje dang 'dra'o// de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa la sogs pa byas te gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa spyan drangs nas/ byang chub kyi

83b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de kho na'i snying po gsum gyi byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ 'dis dbul bar bya'o// oM kA ya bAk+ShIt+ta i da ba liM b+hu dza dzi g+ha phul+la d+hU pa mAM sa bi g+ha am+ba sarba gad+d+ha sarba d+ha wAn+ti pu Ni pheT gA da/ oM a kA ro mu 
83b8(rgyud 'grel): khaM sarba d+harmA NaM/ At+ma nut+panA tA ta oM AHhUM phaT sAhA/ 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du 
84a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas ni// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// muHkha zas la yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o// rnal 'byor gyis ni du bgyur na// de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ 
84a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs su skye dang dam tshig can// skyo med dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang // bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan// spyi shad skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ lagan rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i bu

84a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig gnyis med ya gas yin// zhabs gnyis bden pa gnyis su can// phyag rgya ldan mangs rgyas lnga// gdug pa gdul lji tho ba yon// sngags pa sna de ltar mas byas nas// lU yinal 'byur pas

84b1(rgyud 'grel): lo// k+Shi sreg zi las kyi rim pa la/ dbang bskur ba'i sngan rolatu rgyas pa'i lus byas te/ dpangs khrugang la zhwa byung thung du bana'o// sar ba'i phyir bgyid/ kha khyer sar bzhis bskor// zheng dang spangs sor bani 
84b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de'i phyi rol gyi sor bzhi bor la/ pad+ma'i phreng ba btang / dbus kyi khakhyer la rdo rje rab btang / spyir gru bzhi la zhe phyi rol gyi rgya thugasum btang / thab bung nang du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bzhag pa ni 'jim pa la sogs 
84b3(rgyud 'grel): seM byu pangs sang stsagag pa dang jug/ hU~M byung ldan no/ rnas pa'i las pa la// napa' 'ang rnams 
84b4(rgyud 'grel): khrug du byas// khro byed zabs su ba rko// 'khyer rgyas pa la sogs pa dang mthun par bya'o// dbus kyi 'khyer la rdo rje phreng ba btang / de'i phyi rol tu pad+ma btang / thab khung du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan bzhag pa ni dbus sa rdo / 
84b5(rgyud 'grel): shar du 'khor lo// lhor rin po che/ nub du pad+ma/ byeng du ral g+ni/ zheng sor brgyad pa bya'o// kha dog dkar po thAg/ bla ma la byang du ba lnga/ dbang gi las la thab khung blag sa ste/ blag mag shul la bzhi bcu btang / kha khyer la 
84b6(rgyud 'grel): sor bzhi bcub sa pa/ thabs su sor bcu banye bar bya// kha khyer sbyar mthun/ kha khyer rdo rje'irab btang / phyi ri padu po ra btang / kha dag dpar por byug/ tsan+dan smug pos blag/ dbus su gtso bo'i phyag mtshan btang ba/

89b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams kyis brjod do// A ra~M r-I la~M/ praH sA la sogs pa rnams kyi'o// lAM e a o// si be na rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rnams kyis brjod do// oM a sa bon dag ni 'og dang steng gi gnas pa dag 
89b5(rgyud 'grel): ging yang brjod do// sems dang phan pa rin chen bdag/ tshe dpag med dang don grub kyis// bdag med la sogs phyag rgya gdag/ shes rabab par mer rnams par gnas// sems dang phan pa'i rin chen bdag/ tsher bag 
89b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa bde gshegs kyis// mtshams nas prag skyil sogs// rim pa'i rjes la phrug rgyas gdag// rnal 'bying pa ni bzhi rnams kyis// rab tu bsgoms gnas nyid la ni// zhe snang gti mug sar sna dang // 'dod mas 
89b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyag rgyas gang pa// 'og dang steng dang sku gsung gi// phyag rgyas byed pas rdzogs pa'o// b+ha ga rgyas gad pa dang rtan pa 'dis// de nas phyag rgya nyi shu brjod// dbang por rdo rjeg shin gau re// chu bdag tshu yirnal 'byor ma/ 
89b8(rgyud 'grel): lus ngan rdo rnam pa' 'grom// dbus su bdag med nar 'byor ma// dbang ldan du ni prag s+ho// de bzhin 'tshad med nge khrod ma// bden bral dun gtum mo ste// drang du srong brjod pa'o// yang ni shar sgor dkar mos/ 
89b9(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin myong ni chom thun ma// nub kyi sgo la ro langs sa// de bzhin byang du byas te// 'og tus spyod ma bshad de// seng du mapa' spyad mar brjod do// ji skar bdag ming nal 'byor ma// thams cad dam par dga' ba'o// 
90a1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar rang gi sa bon bas ma// 'od zer byung ste de nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams ni spyan drangs te// lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya// phyi nas gsol ba gdab pa ni// bcom ldan bdag nyid chen po rnams// 
90a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol// bum pa bdud rtsi lngas gang ba// mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur nas ni// dbu rgyan la ni 
90a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs bdag yin// dang par nag po bsgom par bya// gnyis pa dbang po bsgom par bya// gsum pa la ni ser por bsgom// de bzhin bzhi par ljang gu ste// ldo pa kha dog sngon po nyid// drug pa dkar po'i tshul can te// yan 
90a4(rgyud 'grel): lag drug sbom rnal 'byor pas// phyi ras kha dog rnam par spangs// gzugs pung la ni rdo rje ma// tshor ba la ni dkar mo brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin 
90a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis// bdag med rnal 'byor ma rnams so// dkyil 'khor bdag mo 'jigs gzugs gnas// 'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs pa mdzad// sa ni prak+ka se ru bshad// de bzhin chu khams ri khrod ma// me ni gtum mor shes par bya// 
90a6(rgyud 'grel): rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad// sgal chom rkun ma rab grags// dri yi chal ro langs ma// ro la g+ha sma ri rab brjod// reg bya sa spyod mar bshad de// tshes kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod 
90a7(rgyud 'grel): me// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// mig dag gti mug rdo rje yin// rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sA la ser sna mar bshad de// khal 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la 
90a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag med rnal 'byor ma// go cha 'di rnams ches dag pas// dbang po rnams kyis rnam par sbyong // skyes pa'i thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// gri gug lha ni gcod pa ste// thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi// phreng ba'i steng du gnas pa'o// 
90b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo gzung // bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// spod tshig mi mnyan pa yi phyir// nyan pa dag tu na cha 'dzin// sngags zlos phyir ni mgul do ste// lag gdub srog chags gsod 
90b2(rgyud 'grel): pa spangs// phyag rgya bsten phyir ska rags te// sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya yis// rtag tu lus la gdab par bya// sngags ni/ oM a A i I u U r-i r-I la lAM e ai o oM aM swA hA// phyag rgya'i rnam dag bshad bya ba// 'khor
90b3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i gzugs kyis mi baspyod pa// 'od dpag med pa rna tsha'i bdag/ mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag/ lag pa la ni rnam snang mdzad// ske rags la ni don yod gnas// 'di rnams dgal phyag rgya lnga// skyon ni yongs 'joms
90b4(rgyud 'grel): / 'dzin pa'o// nal 'byor mas ni rab tu gzung // nang gi rnal 'byor bshad par bya// gzugs 'jig rten dbang du byed// thob pa gzugs kyis sreg par byed// A li kAli skabs zhugs pas// byi rol byin gnyis gnyis bkag// grong khyer dkrug pa 
90b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni// oM A ka tsaT ta pa ya sha swAhA// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ni// oM A ka ro mA khaM sarba d+harmA d+hA/ Ad+ha nAt+pa n+na ta ta/ oM AHhUM phaT swAhA// rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma'o// sdum pa'i dbye 
90b6(rgyud 'grel): babashad par bya// lte bar phyag rgya chen por gnas// rtag tu bde ba chen por 'dzag/ rno phyir me yi gzugs su ni// de yang ma mi rnams kyis brtags// dang por dbyings yig rang bzhin te// glong ni sangs rgyas rnams 
90b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtags// 'jig rten gsum du khyab gnas kyang // so so'i skye bos pa shes so// bdag med lus kyi nang na gnas// zhim med pa ni kha dog tu// rgyun mi 'chad par byang chub sems// sbyor bas brtags par 'dzin/ 
90b8(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// de phyir lus la rtsa gsum gnas// rkyang ma rom kun daro ma// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyi ni// las kyi phyag rgya nyid du bcas// rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin dang // ro mthabs kyis yan lag gnas/ 
91a1(rgyud 'grel): a ba d+hU ti'i dbus gnas su// gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa ste// bde chen byed pa'i gzugs can ma// mi bskyod 'bab parkyang ma ste// ro ma khrag ni 'bab pa'o// kun dang mgon po dpag med kyi// rtag tu 
91a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi dngos po mo// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba can// rang gi lus la rtsa rnam gsum// rdo rje rin chen chu skyes kyis// sku gsung thugs ni 'dzag pa ste// gcig pa'i dus ni rdo rje yi// rin chen 'dzin pas dbyings nyid do// dpag 
91a3(rgyud 'grel): med mgon gyi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin brjod pa ste// mtshan mo'ang shin par dag tu yang // rtag tu ye shes skyes pa nyid// lhan cig skyes pa mchog dga' ba// pha yi bde ba bzang po 'bab// dper na gang 
91a4(rgyud 'grel): yang mtshan mo'i khyim nang du// zas za lus kyi yongs su byed 'dod pa// sbar ba mar me yis ni mun rung ltas// de bzhin mun pas bde ba yin// 'di ltar shes bya srid pa'i mtsho dug chu// 'dod chags la sogs sna 'thung 
91a5(rgyud 'grel): khyab// bkres pas gdungs pa rlabs dang 'khril shing rnam 'khril mya ngan gcig pu 'gram chen po// gang phyir byang chub blo ldan skye bo skad cig kyang ni rang don gcig gnyer ba// gti mug zhags pa'i gos ni spangs nas 
91a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol mi 'gro bdag gis ngo mtshar che// blo bzang dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed dang phan pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni rnam dag gug kye dgo cha thams cad nges pa dran pa bral mi bya// phyi nas blo bzang rangs shing
91a7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig rgyun du de nyid cig gis sems dang ldan// rdzogs pa'i rim pa srid pa las byung lhan cig skyes pa rtag tu bsam// // ra d+ha longs spyod chong 'dus sna tshogs brang ldan kang kha'i khab ces bya ming du// stag zhon sna 
91a8(rgyud 'grel): tshegs sbrul mgo gdengs pas brgyan cing gang zhig bzod ldan spyod pa gang // de nas gzhan pa na 'dod phyir 'jig rten don du gang bshad sgrub thabs dbang po 'di// gsang ba'i shes rab yan lag 'du ba bdag gis gang 
91b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad rgyal sras bzod par mdzod// bdud rtsi 'od kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i 
91b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ nai rAt+ma sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba bud med 'dul gzigs nas/ 
91b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag med rnal 'byor mar bsgyur gang // thub pas pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal 'dud// rnal 'byor dang po slob dus na// nges pa'i gnas bzang brtag byas te// gar gnas sngags pas sgrub pa yi// 
91b4(rgyud 'grel): sems ni gcig pu mnyam gzhag pa'i// ri dang tshang tshing bya skyibs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan pa'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bcas byas la// snying gar paM las pad+ma ste// de steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni bsal bar 
91b5(rgyud 'grel): a bsams te// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// rdo rje las byung thugs rje che// na mkhar rje btsun dmigs byas la// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya// gau rI ri bong can 'dzin cing // 
91b6(rgyud 'grel): chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'i snod// ro langs ma ni lag na chu// za phod ma ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka sI lag rdo rje ste// de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gtum mo cang te'u brdung byas te// 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod
91b7(rgyud 'grel): chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// g.yung mos phrag nas 'khyud pa nyid// bla mas sangs rgyas rab tu mchod// bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni// bdun po yongs su dag pa bya// sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang // byed pa yang 
91b8(rgyud 'grel): ni sdom pa dang // bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang // de nas yongs su bsngo bar gyis// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang // lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni// gzhan/ 
92a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi don du dbul ba dang // gnang nod yang ni tshangs pa yi// gnas bzhis sems ni dbugs phyung ste// dang po byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom// gsum pa dga' ba bsgom 
92a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// thams cad tha ba btang snyoms s+ho// phyis ni byang chub sems brdar bya// de nas bsrung ba'i dam tshig go// dang po bder brdzun rnapa dpyad nas// tog pabyan bsgob mi rus// bskyed pa med par rab sbyo 
92a3(rgyud 'grel): bas// bskyed pa 'di ni rab bshad do// oM shUr+ya tA dz+nyA ra badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ spong bar rab bskyed hUM sngon las// sna rogs rdo rje 'bas pa ga tar bya// 'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa// rdulas gsal bar 
92a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes brjod de// 'di las rdo rjes bskor ba'i gur// bla re yang ni bsgob par bya// dam pa'i khams su b+ha ga bsam// de yi dbus su bskom ba ni// yaM byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor ste// sngon po ga ni 
92a5(rgyud 'grel): brdungs ba dan mtshan// byung me yi dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje'i phreng bskor grugasum dmar// bil bzung ba'i dkyil 'bor zla ma// dkar po bral pas bsang ba mdzan// byung dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste// ser po rdoH 
92a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor // b+h+rUM las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag/ srid pa bar ma bsam byas nas// e ba nyid du rab tu 'dres// 'dres gyur de las byung ba ni// sangs rgyas po brang thun mong yin// ngos bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhi yis 
92a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan byas te// dra ba du byed yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// chos 'byud las skyes 'khor lon// bskor gnyis dang skon med pa// je 'phrul nigacig nyid te// grugasum las ni gzhan du brjod// de ma 
92a8(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ro bsams la// bco lnga'i gdan ni bdag nyid do// de'i steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng du sa bon te// phyis ni nyi mas mnan pos so// gnyis su 'dus pa'i bde chen po// A li zla ba'i gzugs su gnas/ 
92b1(rgyud 'grel): kA li nyi ma'i gzugs gnas te// zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus las// gau rI la sogs sa bon ni// a A i I u A r-i r-I l-il-I e e o au aM A li dang po bdag med ma// A li gnyis pa rdo rje ste// A li gsum pa gau re ste// 
92b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drug pa puk+ka sI zhes brjod// ri khrod ma ni bdun pa ste// gtum mo brgyad par shes par bya// dgu pa dang ni g.yung mo nyid// yang ri gau rI lnga gnyis pa// chom rkun ma ni 
92b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes bya// bcu gsum pa ni za phong ma// bcu bzhi sa spyod ma zhes bya// bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma// rnal 'byor ma rnams sa bon no// zla ba me long ye shes ldan// 
92b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ldan pa rta bdun pa// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ri// so sor rtog pa yin zhes brjod// thams cad gcig gyur nar tan te// rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste// 'di dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni// 
92b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te// zla ba nyi ma rab phye bas// A li shes rab kA li thabs// gau rI la sogs 'di las byung // dang po nang gi kha sbyar ba// nges par rnal 'byor ma ldag nas// dbang po rdo rje gshin gau rI// rku bdag chu yi 
92b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o// phyi rol gyi ni kha sbyor la// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI// byin za'i grang ni ri khrod ma// bden bral du ni gtum mo ste// rlung gi mtshams su 
92b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yung mo nyid// 'di dag mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma// shar gyi phyogs su gau rA ste// lho dang nub dang byang du ni// tshem rkun ro langs za bod ma'o// 'di dag phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma'o// steng zhal ma dang 'og zhal ma// lha mo sa spro/ 
92b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' spyod ma'o// 'khor lo'i bdag po bdag med ma// zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum dmar// phyag gnyis skra ser gyen du 'greng // g.yon pa thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas pa'i phyag gis gri gug 'dzin// 'khor lon cha mgur chu 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags 'dzin// skyil krung byed pas ro mnan nas// stag gi pags pas smad bkris shing // bdag med rnal 'byor ji bzhin tu// 'di dag thams cad mtshungs par bshad// rang 
93a2(rgyud 'grel): snying pad snying sa bon bsam// ye shes snying gar ye shes bsgom// dgug pa byas te yang dag mchod// ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya// mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// 
93a3(rgyud 'grel): gti mug rdo rje mig gnyis la// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sA la ser sna ma zhes brjod// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// reg la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma// sku gsung de bzhin thugs kyi ni// oM dang AHhUM 
93a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di las// mkhas spyod ma dang sa spyod ma// sa 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya// sna tshogs gzugs su yang dag brjod// 'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad sogs// snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer ni// lcags kyu'i rnam pas 
93a5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs bkug/ lha mo brgyad kyis mchod byas na// dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol// de nas he ru ka yi gzugs// de nas bdag la dbang
93a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur bsam// sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag/ snang ba mtha' yas don grub rnams// bdag med shar gyi rdo rje sogs// rnal 'byor ma lnga rgya yis gdab// sems dang rtag pa'i rin chen bdag/ snang mtha' mtshams kyi rnal 
93a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byir ma// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal che// 'dod chags rdo rje phyogs gnas ma// rgyas gdab sku dang gsung nyid kyis// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma// dang po nag po bsgom par bya// gnyis pa dmar po bsgom pa ste// gsum pa ser 
93a8(rgyud 'grel): po bsgom pa'o// de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu'o// lnga pa kha dog sngon po'o// drug pa dkar por rnam par bsgom// rnal 'byor yan lag drug bsgom bya// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te// spyan la/ 
93b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yang bsregs pas// bsreg pas haM la ri bong 'dzag/ bsam gtan gyis dub rnal 'byor gang // de ni dag pa rjes dran bya// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba gsang ba gau rI ste// de bzhin du lha 'du shes ma/ 
93b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam shes phung po gzugs su ni// bdag med rdo rje ma gnas so// sa khams puk+ka sI ru brjod// chu khams ri khrod ma ru brjod// drod ni gtum mor rab tu brjod// rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// 
93b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la gau ri rab tu grags// sgra la chom rkun rab tu grags// dri yi cha la ngo langs ma// rol de bzhin za bod ma// reg bya la ni sa sprod de// chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma// zhe sdang rdo rje mar bshad do// 'dod chags chu yi rnal/ 
93b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma// phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// ser sna gsang ba'i gau rI ma// de bzhi gti mug rdo rje ste// yid la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// zhe sdang la sogs dag pa'o// skyes pa'i bdud ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug lha ni gcod pa'o// thod pa nyon 
93b5(rgyud 'grel): mongs mgo bo yi// phung po'i bdud ni ror brjod do// mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs// snang ba mtha' ya sa rna cha'i bdag/ mgur chu la ni rin chen bdag/ lag gdub la ni rtag par brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas/ 
93b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga ni rnam par dag/ bsam gtan gyis dub gsang sngags bzlas// A li mtha' yi a spangs pa// oM yig hUM phaT dang ldan pa'i// swA hA mthar bzhag gsang sngags so// oM a A i I u A r-i r-I la lA e e o au/ 
93b7(rgyud 'grel): aM hUM phaT swA hA// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa dang // bgegs ni zad cing zhi ba'i phyir// 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mi g.yo bas ni gtor ma sbyin// rlung mthod pa la gnas pa// 'bar bar bsro ba la sogs pas// sha chen// 
93b8(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub po// yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i// oM in+da dza ma dza la dzak+Sha b+hU ta bah+ni ba u rak+Sha tsan+da sU dz+nyA mA da bap+pa ta la pa tA laM aSh+Ta sap+pa swA hAM/ i daM bi laM b+huny+dza dzaM g+ha/ pul+la d+hU pa puSh+pa mAM sa pid+mA/ am+ba sap+pa kadz+dzA/ 
94a1(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha/ khan+ti lu Ni pe Ta ga da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA tAM/ A d+ha nut+pan+natwAta/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zlabs mdzad pa'i bdag med pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// 
94a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 6// bdag med ma lham bco lnga la bstod pa bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ nai rAt+ma de bI pany+tsa da shasto tra/ bod skad du/ bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga la/ 
94a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mos pa sna tshogs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir// chos dbyings mi bskyod 'gag pa med pa las// thabs kyis sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa// ye shes
94a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid a las skyes// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa 'jigs pa'i tu// mi bskod dbu brgyan bde ba chen po'i ngang // ye shes mkha' 'gro'i cho gsal phyag 'tshal lo// A las
94a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i mdzes ma rdo rje ma// rtag tu dgyes pas kha T+wAM ga la gzigs// gdug pa rnam skrag rnam snang cod pan thogs// dur khrod rgyan dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// i las byung ba'i gsang ba'i gau rI ma// gzi brjid mi mtshungs 
94a6(rgyud 'grel): gor ldan ro mchog myong // don dam thugs chud dbu rgyan rin chen tog/ spyan gsumathong rlon can la phyag 'tshal lo// A li kA li'i snyoms 'jug rnal 'byor ma// bde la rtag dgyes byang chub sems kyi ngang // 'od dpag med kyis 
94a7(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan I las skyes// gar gyis dgyes pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// u las byung ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// khams gsum dag byed sgrol ma las kyi mchog/ don grub dbu rgyan chags pa'i spyan dang ldan// mtshungs med
94a8(rgyud 'grel): gas par la kyag 'tsham po// skye ma kyi pa dbyeng sa ma dag zugs// me baspyad ba rgyad dri ma dag pa cig// sbrulas skyes papa byed ze sa 'o// na nas da pa rgyan lalo// du gsus 
94b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus ma byas pa'i ri khrod ma// spros bral dri med rnam snang dbul bzhugs// ri las 'khrungs pa gar gyis phyogs bcur gzigs// chu zla dang mtshungs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bgrod mdzad cing // 
94b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed ma lus bsreg mdzad tsaN+Da li// rin chen dbu rgyan brjid pas rI las skyes// 'dzag pa gsal mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i bdag nyid las// thugs rje bskyed mdzad g.yo ba'i Dom+bi nI/ 
94b3(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo snang mthas dbu rgyan la las byung // mkha' ltar dri med skal phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu grag pa'i brda' yi skad spor zhing // ru ti ra dang an+ta la rtag dgyes// zhe sdang rdo rjes dbu rgyan l-I las skes// gau rI phyogs 
94b4(rgyud 'grel): bcur gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid gsal ba'i yum gyur chom rkun ma// mi rtog mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don la brtson// dbu rgyan gti mug rdo rje mi 'gyur rtags// e las bskyed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 
94b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus chags las dbang du mdzad// dpal ldan gzi brjid bskyed mdzad bet+tA lI// nga rgyal rdo rjes dbu brgyan aM las skyes// snyoms 'jug mi gnas ngang la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab thabs su ldan pa'i g+ha sma ri// de nyid 
94b6(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed 'dod chags rdo rjes brgyan// oM las byung ba drag po'i las las skyes// skye med skye bar bstan la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du mkha' la spyod// bar snang mnga' mdzad he ru ka yi ngang // cod pan
94b7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mtha' yas oM las skyes// thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan sa 'og spyod// 'og gi 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mdzad ma// aM las byung ba'i dur khrod 'jigs
94b8(rgyud 'grel): pas brgyan// thabs mkhas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// A li kA li zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor sa 'og rnam par dag pa las// gri gug zod pa la sogs phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa mdzes mdzad cing // skyil krung phyed pa'i
95a1(rgyud 'grel): gar ldan gcer bu spyan gsum stag lpags sham thabs can// phyag rgya chen po'i sku la rtsa gsum sprul mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams ye shes chen po las byung sku lnga ye shes lngar ldan 'jigs pa'i 
95a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can ma// bdag nyid dad pa'i mthu yis rgyu yi yon tan shas tsam mthong nas dad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i rnam rtog rlung gis rgya mtsho phyogs bcur 
95a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yengs pa rnams// skye rgan 'chi spangs nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bla med byang chub thob par shog// slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'o// @6// bdag med ma'i rab tugs le ba bzhugs// / rgya gar skad du/ 
95a4(rgyud 'grel): nai rAt+ma pra ka sa/ bod skad du/ bdag med ma'i rab tu gsal ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu rtog pa yongs spangs chos skur gang brjod pa// dpe med bde ba tsam mdzes longs spyod 
95a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sku// sa yaM phan pa'i rgyur gyur gang gi sprul pa'i sku// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' khyod des dge bar shog/ gcig tu gsal la rgyas pa yis// mi rtog nyung la rgyas pa dag/ ji ltar blo bzhin lung
95a6(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin// bdag med ma yi sgrub thabs bshad// rnal 'byor pas yang dur khrod la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsten nas bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste/ zhen pa med
95a7(rgyud 'grel): cing dogs pa dang bral bas sems can gyi don du blo bskyed de bdag med ma'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hUM sngon po bsgoms te/ de nas de'i gsal ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis khams 
95a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum snang bar byas nas 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnams bkug ste/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba phyag bcu drug pa/ zhabs brgyad pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras pa'i thod can zhabs bzhi
95b1(rgyud 'grel): yis bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa kha dog sngon po// g.yas pa'i phyag gi tshogs rnams kyis bsnams pa'i thod pa rnams su gnas pa ni glang po che dang / rta dang / bong bu dang / glang dang / rnga mo dang / skyes pa dang / seng ge dang // 
95b2(rgyud 'grel): byi la rnams so// cig shos kyi phyag gi cho gas rnams su son pa'i pad+ma'i snod rnams su gnas pa ni/ 'dzin pa dang / chu dang / skul byed dang / 'bar ba dang / mtshan mo'i mgon dang / nyi ma dang / gshin rje dang / gnod 
95b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rnams so// zhal gyi gtso bo ni nag po'o// g.yas pa'i zhal ni zla ba dang / kun da lta bu'o// g.yon pa'i zhal shin du dmar ba'o// steng gi zhal du blta bu shin tu gtsigs pa'o// zhal gzhan mtha' dag ni shin tu gnag pa'o// 
95b4(rgyud 'grel): brgya phyed kyi thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o// bdag med ma'i mgul nas 'khyud pa/ na mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa mdun du bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes su phyi dang / gsang ba dang / de kho na nyid rnams kyis mchod pa lha mo brgyad
95b5(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// 'di la yang thabs dang shes rab dag gis de'i bdag nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir pi tsu badz+ra'i mchod pa'o// de nas phyag 'tshal ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / sdig pa slan chad sdom pa dang / 
95b6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams yongs su sngo ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas te/ tshangs pa'i gnas// 
95b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsgom par bya'o// dngos po mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos po bsdus pa/ oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid la chos thams cad ces bya ba'i sngags kyi don
95b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i ngo bor gnas so// de nas smon lam gyis dran pa solangs te/ raM las mdun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor blta'o// de la yi ge hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsam mo// de nas de'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i// 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi rdul phra rab kyi tsho gas 'phros pa de yis rdo rje ra ba dang drab bcing ngo // 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang / 'obs bsam par bya'o// nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag las 'od zer dpag tu med 
96a2(rgyud 'grel): pa byung bas de ltar de dag thams cad brtan par bya'o// de'i rjes su na mkha'i dbyings chos 'byung gi rnam pa nang khong stong shin tu dkar po steng yangs pa'i shes rab blta bar bya'o// de nas de'i steng du kha dog sna tshogs 
96a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas de'i steng du raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su yang 
96a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang / me dang / chu dang / sa rnams ni du ba dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu rnams/ gzhu dang / zung gsum dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi rnams/ yaM raM bai laM rnams yongs su gyur pa las steng nas steng du 
96a5(rgyud 'grel): blta'o// de dag thams cad ye shes tsam du btags te/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las/ gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ rtababs bzhi pa/ ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa/ dra ba dang dra ba byed pas brgyan pa'i gzhal yas 
96a6(rgyud 'grel): khang blta bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol tu dur khrod brgyad bsam par bya'o// shar phyogs su dbang po dang / a ru ra'i shing dang glang po che'i gdong can ser po'o// lho phyogs su gshin rje dang / tsu da'i shing dang / ma

96b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'byung po dang // khyu mchog gi gdong can no// n+ya gro d+ha sna tshogs pa bsgom mo// 'di dag thams cad lag pa g.yon par thod pa 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas par rang rang gi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa'o// lus kyi stod 
96b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o// de bzhin du shar phyogs la sogs pa tshogs brgyad du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du/ mtha' yas dang / pad+ma dang / nor rgyas dang / pad+ma chen po dang / 'jog po dang / dung skyong dang / karno Ta dang / rigs ldan rnams so// sprin brgyad

96b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bsams te/ pad+ma'i nang shar phyogs la sogs pa'i 'dab mo bzhi dang / de bzhin du gzhal yas khang gi zur bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / steng dang

96b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dang ldan pa ni zla ba'o// mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa ni nyi ma'o// de dag gi nang du son pa ni so sor rtog pa'o// thams cad gcig pa ni bya ba nan tan no// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa ni chos dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//

97a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma rnams la/ a i I u'i dbyangs las byung ba/ gti mug dang / bra ma dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog gi rang bzhin/ rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag med dang / don yod

97a8(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i mdog lta bu ste/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sba 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa/ spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin thod pa dum bu ser bzhi pa 'dzin pa/ mgo la yang sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin thod pa skam pa 
97b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga 'dzin pa'o// spyan zlum po dmar po gsum pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ma mo bco lnga'i bdag nyid kyi mgo bo skam po bco lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ skyil krung byed pa'i gar gyis 
97b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa rol bcibs pa/ phyag r+b+ha lnga 'dzin pa'o// de la 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med/ mgul pa'i phreng bar rin chen bdag/ lag rgyan rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ ske rags lan 
97b3(rgyud 'grel): don yod gnas// lus kun rdo rje 'dzin bzhin no// bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal spyi bor 'khor lo 'dzin// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la'ang // smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir// rna bdag la sna che 'dzin// sngags bzlas byir
97b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mgul ba'i phreng // phyag rgya bsten pa ske rags te// srog gcod spangs pa gdu bu ste// rkang rgyan dang ni dpung rgyan 'dzin// byams pa'i thugs ni yan lag gnag/ dmar ser gyi ni skra dag ni// 'dod chags chen por ston pa dang / 
97b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bor rtogs phyir steng du brdzes// sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu chags pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir/ rang bzhin gyis spyan dmar po chen po'o// srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin dag ni phyag dag go/ nga rgyal la sogs 
97b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon gcod pa ni gri gug go// khams gsum pa rnam par dag pa phung po la sogs pa'i bdud bzhi la sogs pa'i khrag gis bkang ba rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag gis lus thod pa dum bu gsum mo// chos dang longs spyod dang

98a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i rang gi bdag med ma'i 'khor lo bkug la/ snying ga'i sa bon la gzhug par bya'o// ye shes dang dam tshig sems dpa' dag gcig tu byas nas bdag med ma'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas

98a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa phul du byung ba'i rim gyis dang por sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang ngo // de yang rab kyi phul du phyin pa las ni sgyu ma lta bur snang ngo // de yang rab kyi phul du phyin pa las ni rmi lam lta bur snang / 
98a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes su rab kyi phul du phyin pa yongs su smin pa las ni rme lam dang sad pa'adra ba'i dus su gnyis med par gang gis mthong ba yis phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// gzhan du po langs
